title: 19 Ridiculous Ways to Use Map Art in Minecraft
author: Skip the Tutorial
description:
Download Core to play and create PC games for FREE at http://bit.ly/Core-SkiptheTutorial
Enter the City Building Jam with $25,000 in prizes: https://citybuildingjam.coregames.com/

19 Ridiculous Ways to Use Map Art in Minecraft! Minecraft map art can create some fantastic pixel art to use in your singleplayer and smp worlds. Whether that's a blank infinity matrix room, a news bulletin board messaging system for your friends, or even a 4 panel animation, there are plenty of different ways to use minecraft maps in your survival and creative Minecraft worlds. So, let's see some of the most insane and creative ways to use your minecraft map pixel art in this Skip the Tutorial video.
